entry.title: Athletic Sleeve for Injury Prevention
entry.summary:
Vendor: General Space
Type: Gym
Price: 21.00

<b>See why this is the best selling style of knee braces:</b><br><ul><li>HIGH QUALITY, DURABLE KNEE SLEEVE THAT IS SUPPORTIVE, SOFT, AND BREATHABLE. </li><li>Silicone stabilizers are comfortable and can be worn all day without discomfort. </li><li>3D woven Fabric provides compression and warmth to your joint increasing circulation. Provides the protection you need without bulk. </li><li>Reduces inflammation/swelling, soreness, stiffness, has heating effect for muscular recovery.</li><li>SPORTS: Suitable for all sports activities. Design conforms to your knee to protect and support during all activities. </li><li>PAIN RELIEF: Aid in surgery recovery, runners knee, ligament tears, and chronic painful knee conditions. The compression will immediately stimulate blood flow providing relief and support.</li><li>ANTI-SLIP DOUBLE SILICONE: stable compression to prevent injury during daily activities and any stressors to your knee including weightlifting, running, golf, yoga, all sports. Our innovative design will NOT slip as you perform your activities due to the double anti-slip silicone band around the top. </li><li>UNISEX DESIGN- black material with unisex color piping. This brace is discreet and stylish. Look cool at the gym, on the Courts, or blend in with your clothing.</li><li>SIZING: Fits men, women, and children. Measure 4 inches above your kneecap. Small- 14.5-17inches, Medium- 17-19.5 inches, Large- 19.5-22 inches. If you are on the border, we recommend you order one size up. If you want a tighter fit, order one size smaller. </li><li>PACKAGE: 1x Knee Support</li><li><br>

entry.title: Arm Muscle Fitness ABS
entry.summary:
Vendor: General Space
Type: Gym
Price: 38.50

Specification:
Product name hip trainer +Boby Muscle Trainer
Material PU(polyurethane) Leather
Color Black and Orange
Controller Power Supply 2 x AAA Battery 1.5V
Output Max. 9.8mA
Working Time 12 Minutes(Per installation time)
Frequency 1-100Hz
Using Mode A-F(6 mode)
Intensity 10 classes
Sticker size 26x18.8cm/10.2”x7.4”
Controller size 7.8x6x2.1cm/3”x2.36”x0.82”
 
Features:
1. EMS Trainer can help you tone, tighten and firm your hips and buttocks that you've always wanted!
2. With U shape pad for hips.
3. Self-training at home, in the gym and office.
4. Ergonomic pad design enables great adhesiveness to the hips.
5. Electrical stimulation of the gluteal muscles

Note:
1.Do not attach it with “power on”, because for shocking.
2.Don not touch attach side of adhesive pad, it make decreasing using time.

Package Incleded:
3x ABS Sticker
2x Hip Trainer
6x Arm Trainer
3x Controller
